scripts.build: npm run build -w @lokaltreu/api && npm run build -w @lokaltreu/web
scripts.lint: eslint apps/api packages tests --ext .ts,.tsx,.js --max-warnings 0 && npm run -w @lokaltreu/web lint
scripts.contract: npm run -w packages/types types:codegen && npm run -w @lokaltreu/api test:contract
scripts.test:anti-replay: start-server-and-test dev:stub:3001 http://127.0.0.1:3001 "cross-env BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3001 node tests/security/run-anti-replay.mjs"
scripts.test:device-proof: start-server-and-test dev:stub:3001 http://127.0.0.1:3001 "cross-env BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3001 vitest run --config tests/device-proof/vitest.config.ts"
scripts.test:plan-gate: start-server-and-test dev:stub:3001 http://127.0.0.1:3001 "cross-env BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3001 vitest run --config tests/plan/vitest.config.ts"
scripts.test:contract: start-server-and-test dev:stub:3001 http://127.0.0.1:3001 "cross-env BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3001 vitest run --config tests/contract/vitest.config.ts"
scripts.test:anti-replay:live: start-server-and-test dev:stub:3001 http://127.0.0.1:3001 "cross-env BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3001 node tests/security/run-anti-replay.mjs"
scripts.test:device-proof:live: start-server-and-test dev:stub:3001 http://127.0.0.1:3001 "cross-env BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3001 vitest run --config tests/device-proof/vitest.config.ts"
scripts.test:plan-gate:live: start-server-and-test dev:stub:3001 http://127.0.0.1:3001 "cross-env BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3001 vitest run --config tests/plan/vitest.config.ts"
scripts.test:contract:live: start-server-and-test dev:stub:3001 http://127.0.0.1:3001 "cross-env BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3001 vitest run --config tests/contract/vitest.config.ts"
scripts.test:sec:live: npm run test:anti-replay:live && npm run test:device-proof:live && npm run test:plan-gate:live && npm run test:contract:live
scripts.coverage:sync: pwsh -NoProfile -Command "$srcs = @('apps/api/coverage/coverage-summary.json','apps/api/coverage/v8/coverage-summary.json'); foreach($s in $srcs){ if(Test-Path $s){ New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path coverage | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Force $s coverage/coverage-summary.json; exit 0 } }; Write-Error 'coverage-summary.json nicht gefunden'; exit 1"
scripts.version:ci: changeset version && npm install && git add -A && git commit -m "chore: version packages"
